Allow to control Lego Mindstorms NXT robots
Allow to use NFC tags in programs
Allow to send crash reports automatically
Allow to control Raspberry Pi computers
Get help on how to configure the connection settings
Choose a profile and configurate your personal settings for the Pocket-Code-UI
The large text setting increases the text size.
Fontface allows you to choose a font style you prefer.
Increases the contrast and makes the text on bricks easier to read.
Adds icons to categories and bricks to improve recognizability.
Changes the brick icons to high contrast icons.
The large element spacing increase the space between touchable elements.
Shows only starter bricks for ease of learning.
Adds delay to the drag\'n\'drop of bricks.
Visual improvement: High contrast, additional icons
Visual improvement: Large text, large icons, large element spacing, high contrast
Input improvement: Large element spacing, drag\'n\'drop delay
You have created a new profile! The changes you make can be found in \'My Profile\'
Pocket Code will be restarted to apply the changes you made.
Whoops! Data of this program is not accessible any more!
Whoops! Some data could not be loaded from this Scratch program. Please try again later!
Whoops! Our server is not reachable at the moment, please try later!
Whoops! Failed to convert Scratch program, please try again later!
Whoops! Failed to convert %1$s, please try again later!
Your Pocket Code app is outdated. Our Scratch converter only supports the latest Pocket Code version. Please update it on the Google Play Store!
Cannot open this Scratch program. It seems that you have canceled the conversion/download of the Scratch program or you have renamed/deleted the program in the meanwhile!
Cannot open this Scratch program while it is downloading! Please try again later!
Cannot open this Scratch program since it has not been downloaded yet! Please try again later!
Cannot convert %1$s! Older Scratch before %2$s programs are not supported!

plurals.item: Cannot convert more than %d programs simultaneously!

resources.string: Cannot open Scratch program because the conversion failed!
Connection lost or closed by server!
Connection to server failed, please retry later!
Authentication failed, please contact the Pocket Code team!
Looking for a free worker… Please wait…
WARNING:\nThis seems to be a private program. Converting it may fail!
This program has been converted %1$s ago.

Agar dapat menggunakan Pocket Code dan aplikasi lainnya yang ditawarkan oleh proyek Catrobat, Anda harus menyetujui syarat dan ketentuan kami dan mematuhinya ketika Anda menggunakan Pocket Code dan aplikasi lainnya. Lihat tautan di bawah untuk informasi lebih lanjut.\n
You attempt to use Pocket Code together with Parrot\'s AR.Drone. We strongly remind you to abide to Parrot\'s terms of use for the drone and to Catrobat\'s terms of use for Pocket Code.

Pocket Code is a programming environment and interpreter for Android devices for the visual programming language Catrobat.

 The source code of Pocket Code is mainly licensed under the GNU AGPL v3 License. For further details on the license see the link below.

Program specific NXT settings are not shown when opening a program.
The mapping of NXT sensors to ports is program specific and can only be configured for opened programs!
The selection of drone configuration properties is program specific and can only be configured within the program.
The current program uses Lego Mindstorms NXT bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows
Do not show this message again.
Do you want to overwrite the Sensor on the chosen port?
Menambahkan UserBrick untuk UserBrick yang belum diperbolehkan!
Current project and selected project are the same!
Current scene and selected scene are the same!
Caution! Different resolutions detected. %1$s has resolution %2$dx%3$d and %4$s has resolution %5$dx%6$d. Using resolution of %1$s.
Variable %1$s is used in both programs. If programs use the same variable name they cannot be merged. Please rename the variable in one of the programs and try again.
List %1$s is used in both programs. If programs use the same name for their lists they cannot be merged. Please rename the list in one of the programs and try again.
"The flash can be used with the back camera only. Please add a \"Use camera\" brick and change to your device\'s back camera. "
If you enjoy Pocket Code, please rate us on Google Play!
Deleting a variable that is still in use is dangerous! Are you sure?
Your program gets uploaded to our community page where others can use and download it. You can also download your program as standalone app.
All bricks are sorted in categories. Choose the category you are looking for.
To add a brick to your script tap on the brick you want to use.
Short tap on a brick opens the menu to move, copy, delete or add a brick to the backpack. The help option will show you additional information. Drag and drop the brick with a long press.
The script defines the behaviour of your object. To add bricks to the script tap on the \"+\" symbol.
Here you can find the different appearances of your object. To add a new look tap on the \"+\" symbol.
Here you can add new sounds to your object. Keep in mind to use a brick from the sound category.
Your program consists of different objects that can interact with each other. To add a new object tap on the \"+\" symbol.
To merge two programs long press on one program to open the menu and tap on \'Merge with\'.
Hit the back-button to pause your program. To show axes and the screen size of your phone tap \"Axes on\".
A program can consist of different independent scenes. To add a new scene tap on the \"+\" symbol.
Please help to improve Pocket Code by sending us anonymous crash reports!
